hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #stalfos in the Shadow Temple# guard #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Stalfos Room Chest

Spirit Temple MQ GS Symphony Room
